about.online_tool: Rayuwa Dictionaries ne mobile-friendly yanar gizo kayan aikin da Support miyagun, a karkashin-wakilta da kuma diasporic harsuna.
about.promote_connectivity: Jagorancin al'umma gwagwarmaya a duniya, Living Dictionaries ne hadin baki multimedia ayyukan da taimako harsuna tsira ga al'ummomi masu zuwa.
about.td_beginnings: Asali da aka sani da "Talking Dictionary" software, mu dandali aka farko kaddamar a 2006 ta Living Harsuna masana ilimin harsuna Gregory D. S. Anderson da kuma K. David Harrison. A shekarar 2020, Living Harsuna Cibiyar sabunta sunan da kayan aiki don Living Dictionaries.
about.manage_entries: Sarrafa Dictionary: View & Edit Entries a Real-Time
about.private_public: Sa Dictionaries matsayin Private ko Jama'a
about.language_is_history: Harsuna suna Adam ta rai tarihi. suka encode ƙarni na kakanninmu hikima alaka da yanayi, na gida da al'adu da kuma yafi. Harshe ne m, m ruwan tabarau ta hanyar abin da muka gane da duniya da kuma bayyana kanmu. Akwai kan 3,000 barazana da kuma miyagun harsuna a duniya, da kuma shi ne har zuwa mu a halin yanzu tsara don magance wannan matsala da gaggawa kafin yana da latti.
about.important_to_document: Ba wai kawai yake da muhimmanci a kimiyance daftarin aiki da kuma kiyaye miyagun harsuna, amma daga wani ilimi bisa, koyo daya ta al'adunmu harshe ne mai goyon baya ga al'ummomin da suke so su kare kuma ka yi tasbĩhi da al'adunsu da, gida, kazalika da waje ba. Sanin game da daya ta bangaren ilimin harsuna da al'adu asalin yana gagarumin, m kiwon lafiya tasirin, da kuma wannan fassara ga mafi alheri daga cikin al'umma a cikin dogon lokacin da.
about.what_is_LT: Mene ne Living Harsuna Institute for miyagun Harsuna?
about.leading_research: Living Harsuna Cibiyar miyagun Harsunan ne a manyan bincike kungiyar sadaukar domin tattara bayanai miyagun harsuna. Kafa ta masanin ilimin harsuna Dr. Gregory D. S. Anderson, Living Harsuna Institute ne ba riba bincike institute tushen a Salem, Oregon, da m masu bincike da kuma hadin gwiwar dake ko'ina cikin duniya.
about.two_decades_experience: Tare da kusan biyu shekarun da suka gabata na fieldwork kwarewa, masu bincike, a Living Harsuna Institute for miyagun Harsuna suna da basira da kuma hanyoyin da wuri don taimakon al'umma daftarin aiki, kare, da kuma gabatar da su harsuna.
about.help_us_launch_more: Taimako Mu Launch More Rayuwa Dictionaries
about.with_your_help: Tare da taimakon ku, za mu iya ci gaba da inganta mu software da kuma yin shi samuwa ga wani al'umma cewa yanã son ya haifar da nasu Living Dictionary. Ba da kyauta yau kuma yi tasiri!
about.flashcard_view: Duban Katin Flash don Masu Koyan Harshe
about.contributor_awards: Kyautar Al'umma Mai Ba da gudummawa
about.question_1: Da fatan za a ba da wasu bayanan baya game da wannan harshe. A ina ake magana? Wadanne al'ummomi ne ke jin wannan yare? Shin wannan harshe yana cikin haɗari?
about.question_2: Menene sunayen mutanen da suka gina wannan ƙamus? Muryoyin wa ke cikin wannan ƙamus?
about.question_3: Daga ina bayanan da ke cikin wannan ƙamus suka fito? Da fatan za a kwatanta idan kun tattara bayanan da kanku. Idan kun yi amfani da wasu hanyoyin da aka buga, da fatan za a jera su.
about.question_4: Wanene zai yi amfani da wannan ƙamus? Za a yi amfani da shi a cikin kowane ayyukan ilimi?
about.question_5: Idan kana son jama'a su tuntube ka game da wannan aikin, da fatan za a ba da bayanan tuntuɓar ku, ko hanyar haɗi zuwa inda mutane za su iya ƙarin koyo. Wannan na zaɓi ne.
about.message: Kafin bayyana ƙamus ɗin ku ga jama'a, da fatan za a cika sashin Game da.

contributors.ld_produced_by: Wannan Living Dictionary da aka samar a Living Harsuna Institute for miyagun Harsuna karkashin shugabanci na wadannan mutane:
contributors.speakers_other_collaborators: jawabai da kuma wani hadin gwiwar
contributors.developer_designer: Web Developer da kuma Interface Designer
contributors.all_rights_reserved_permission: An adana duk haƙƙoƙi. Kada raba ko haifa ba tare da izni.
contributors.manager_contributor_distinction: Lura: Manajojin ƙamus na iya ƙarawa, gyara ko share abun ciki. Masu ba da gudummawa su ne masu haɗin gwiwar aikin waɗanda kuma za su iya ƙarawa da gyarawa, amma ba za su iya share kowane abun ciki ba.
contributors.how_to_cite_instructions: Ƙara marubutan wannan ƙamus don nuna sunayensu a cikin ambaton

audio.tapToStopRecording: Sa'an nan za ku matsa zuwa tsayar da rikodi
audio.undo_permission_denied_explanation: Izni domin samun Reno aka hana. Idan ka a baya ya danna 'A'a', don Allah Reload da kuma danna 'a' a lokacin da browser tambaya ga izinin amfani da Reno.

contact.message_sent: Saƙon aika. Za mu amsa da zaran mun iya.

contact.learning: Ƙirƙiri kayan koyon harshe daga ƙamus na

create.speech_community_permission: Shin magana al'umma damar wannan harshe ya zama online? Zabi 'OK' idan sun yi muku izni.
create.at_least_one_lang: Zabi akalla 1 harshen da ya sa ƙamus samuwa a.
create.only_letters_numbers: Kawai haruffa da lambobi yarda (babu fili ko haruffa na musamman)
create.gloss_dictionary_clarification: Harshe (s) kana so ka fassara shigarwar cikin.
create.name_clarification: Wannan zai zama sunan da kamus.
create.permanent_url_msg: Sunan URL ɗin dindindin ne kuma ba za a iya canza shi daga baya ba.
create.add_gloss_msg: Kuna iya ƙara ƙarin yaruka masu sheki daga baya a ƙarƙashin Saituna.
create.language_used_by_community: Shin wannan ƙamus na wani harshe ne da wani takamaiman al'ummar ɗan adam ke magana ko sa hannu?
create.community_permission: Shin al'ummar yare sun ba ku izinin yin wannan ƙamus?
create.author_connection: Da fatan za a yi bayanin a taƙaice yadda kuka san wannan yare da kuma dalilin da yasa kuke ƙirƙirar ƙamus na Rayuwa don shi. Shin kuna cikin al'ummar da za su yi amfani da wannan Kamus na Rayuwa? Idan ba haka ba, ta yaya kuka san al'umma?
create.con_lang_description: Shin wannan ƙamus na harshe ne da aka gina (harshen da mutane suka ƙirƙira a cikin 'yan shekarun nan, don littafi ko fim)? Idan eh, don Allah a ɗan kwatanta.
create.map_instructions: Danna kan taswirar don ƙara daidaitawa na sakandare.
create.print_access: Bada Masu kallo su Buga ƙamus

entry.signed_in_as_manager: Ka dole ne a sanya hannu a matsayin manajan wannan kamus yi canje-canje.

error.run_into_error: Muna yi hakuri, mun gudu a cikin wani kuskure.
error.error_recorded: The kuskure da aka rubuta da kuma za mu iya neman shiga da shi.
error.please_explain: Za ka iya don Allah ka aika mana da wani short note don bayyana abin faru?

misc.out_of_service:
Na gode da ziyartar gidan yanar gizon mu! Ana kan gina wannan shafin na ɗan lokaci.
Ba zai kasance tsakanin Fabrairu 3 da Fabrairu 12, 2025 ba.
Da fatan za a sake ziyartar wannan shafin a ranar 13 ga Fabrairu, 2025.
Za ku iya ƙirƙirar sabbin ƙamus na Rayuwa a lokacin.
Yi hakuri da rashin jin daɗi, kuma na gode da haƙurin ku.
A halin yanzu, sauran dandamali suna aiki akai-akai.
misc.transmitter: Da gaske, ƙungiyar Kamus na Rayuwa

settings.community_permission: Shin magana al'umma damar wannan harshe ya zama online?
settings.public_private_meaning: Jama'a nufin kowa zai iya gani da ƙamus da bukatar al'umma yarda. Private kamus ne bayyane ne kawai zuwa gare ku, kuma ku hadin gwiwar.
settings.unable_to_delete: Lura: ba za ku iya share waɗannan yaruka masu sheki daga baya ba.
settings.print_access_meaning: Wannan yana ba jama'a ikon saukewa da buga wannan Kamus na Rayuwa a matsayin .PDF

speakers.speaker_agrees: The magana ya amince ya bar wadannan rikodin zama a fili akwai online.
speakers.name: sunan

terms.agree_by_submit: By mika wannan tsari, za ka yarda da mu

upload.file_must_be_smaller: Fayil dole ne karami fiye da

export.checking_images: Dubawa idan fayilolin hoto sun wanzu
export.checking_audios: Dubawa idan fayilolin mai jiwuwa sun wanzu
export.availability: Ana samun fitarwa ga manajojin ƙamus kawai

video.prepare_to_record_video: Shirya don yin rikodi da Makirufo & Kamara
video.video_info: Akwai hanyoyi guda biyu don nuna bidiyon ku a cikin Kamus na Rayuwa: 1) Kuna iya yin rikodin bidiyonku nan, ko loda bidiyon ku da aka yi rikodi a dandali. Abũbuwan amfãni: mai sauƙi kuma mai girma don rikodin sauri. Hasara: Kuna iya loda bidiyo har zuwa 100MB kawai don haka dole ne ya zama gajere kuma mara nauyi. 2) Samun bidiyon ku akan sabis na talla wanda ya ƙware a ajiyar bidiyo da haɗa URL zuwa rukunin yanar gizon mu. Abũbuwan amfãni: mai sauƙi (idan dai an riga an ɗora bidiyon ku akan wannan dandamali), bidiyon ku na iya samun ƙuduri da tsawon da kuke so. Hasara: idan kuna son yin rikodin wani abu na bazata ko kuma mai sauqi qwarai, yana iya zama ƙoƙari da yawa don yin haka, kuma kuna iya fifita hanya ta 1.
video.paste_video_url: Manna hanyar haɗin YouTube ko Vimeo
video.previously_dismissed_msg: Idan a baya ka yi watsi da bukatar mai binciken, da fatan za a sake lodawa kuma ka danna 'Ee' lokacin da mai binciken ka ya nemi izini.
video.permission_denied: An hana izinin shiga kafofin watsa labarai.

print.availability: Duban bugawa yana samuwa ga manajojin ƙamus da masu ba da gudummawa kawai

import_page.instructions_1: Idan kun riga kuna da bayanan harshe waɗanda kuke son shigo da su cikin ƙamus ɗinku, da fatan za a bi matakan da ke ƙasa.
import_page.instructions_2: Danna maɓallin shuɗin "Haɗin zuwa Samfura" a ƙasa. Zazzage samfurin azaman fayil ɗin Excel, ko ƙirƙirar kwafi akan Google Docs. Shirya samfurin bisa ga bukatun aikin ku. Kwafi da liƙa bayanan ku a cikin maƙunsar bayanai.
import_page.instructions_3: Yi amfani da "Contact Us" da ke ƙasa don tuntuɓar mu. Bari mu san cewa kuna da sabon maƙunsar rubutu wanda ke shirye don shigo da kaya. Yi mana tambayoyi da kuke da su. Za mu amsa muku ta imel, sannan za ku iya aiko mana da fayil ɗin ku.
import_page.instructions_4: Don aiko mana da bayanan da aka fitar daga manhajojin ƙamus kamar FLEx, Lexique Pro, Shoebox, da fatan za a yi amfani da maɓallin “Contact Us” da ke ƙasa kuma gaya mana cikakkun bayanai na aikin ku.
import_page.no_imports: A halin yanzu muna aiki tare da al'ummomi da yawa da ƙungiyoyin haɗin gwiwa don shigo da adadi mai yawa na shigarwar ƙamus zuwa wannan dandali. Har ila yau, muna yin babban sabuntawa ga bayanan mu. Za mu karɓi sabbin shigo da bayanai daga ranar 1 ga Yuli, 2024. Muna godiya da haƙurin ku, kuma muna ba da hakuri kan rashin jin daɗi.

history.entry_message: Mai amfani ya gyara wannan shigarwa akan
history.history_search: Bincika shigarwar, masu gyara, filaye da ƙima

banner.message: Muna ci gaba da inganta bayanan mu a ranar 22 ga Oktoba daga karfe 7 na yamma agogon Gabas (New York), na awanni 24. Ba za a sami damar gyarawa ba a lokacin. Yi hakuri da cikas.
